mapper.select: SELECT mgno, title, poster, price, rownum FROM (SELECT mgno, title, poster, price FROM goods WHERE category LIKE '%'||#{cate}||'%' ORDER BY mgno ASC) WHERE rownum<=5

SELECT mgno,poster,title,price,num FROM (SELECT mgno,poster,title,price,rownum as num FROM (SELECT mgno,poster,title,price FROM goods WHERE category LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goods WHERE category LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%'
